tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE candidate_interactions (
  interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT NOT NULL,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  touchpoint VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  interaction_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_interactions (
  candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  touchpoint_id INT,
  interaction_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE candidates (
    candidate_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    application_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE touchpoints (
    touchpoint_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    touchpoint_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    touchpoint_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    candidate_id INT REFERENCES candidates(candidate_id)
);

CREATE TABLE candidates ( candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY, candidate_name VARCHAR(50), interaction_date DATE, engagement_level INT )
CREATE TABLE recruitment_touchpoints ( touchpoint_id INT PRIMARY KEY, touchpoint_name VARCHAR(50), touchpoint_type VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE candidate_interactions ( interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, candidate_id INT, touchpoint_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), interaction_date DATE, notes TEXT )
CREATE TABLE engagement_levels ( level_id INT PRIMARY KEY, level_description VARCHAR(100), level_weight INT )

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT,
  touchpoint_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE candidates (
  candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_name VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE touchpoints (
  touchpoint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  touchpoint_name VARCHAR(100),
  touchpoint_type VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE engagement_levels (
  level_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  level_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE interaction_engagement (
  interaction_id INT,
  level_id INT
)
